body_html: @rryan -- Agreed. I may be mistaken but I think the tf.gather() portion of tf.contrib.signal.stft() must run on cpu, and cpu is probably better suited for that operation, whereas having to copy a tensor to cpu to run tf.exp() on complex64 seemed silly. It appears @facaiy has implemented a gpu kernel that fixes this. Thanks.
